    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActiveSkill
    Definition for an active skill bound to an action slot.
    ActiveSkillEvent
    Fired when an active skill is successfully triggered.
    ActiveSkillExecutor
    Executes active skill effects.
    ActiveSkillService
    Handles active skill triggers from input events.
    ArcaneTorrentEffect
    Spawns a stream of projectiles toward a target position.
    ClassCommands
    RPG Class management commands for TalaniaClassRPG.
    ClassDefinitionsConfig
    Optional class metadata definitions for UI display.
    ClassDefinitionsConfig.ClassDefinition
     
    ClassProgressionService
    Handles class leveling and XP progression.
    ClassRpgCombatSystem
    Applies class passive effects during combat.
    ClassRpgConfig
    Configuration for class RPG progression and skill balance.
    ClassRpgConfig.ArcaneTorrent
     
    ClassRpgConfig.BladeBarrier
     
    ClassRpgConfig.CombatXp
     
    ClassRpgConfig.Dawnbreaker
     
    ClassRpgConfig.EvasiveShot
     
    ClassRpgConfig.Flashbang
     
    ClassRpgConfig.LeadStorm
     
    ClassRpgConfig.PhantomEdge
     
    ClassRpgConfig.PrimalRoar
     
    ClassRpgConfig.Radiance
     
    ClassRpgConfig.RainOfVengeance
     
    ClassRpgConfig.ShadowStep
     
    ClassRpgConfig.Skills
     
    ClassRpgConfig.Thunderfall
     
    ClassRpgConfig.UndyingRage
     
    ClassRpgConfig.ValdorsVerdict
     
    ClassRpgConfig.VoidRift
     
    ClassRpgConfig.Whirlwind
     
    ClassRpgRuntime
    Runtime wiring for TalaniaClassRPG services.
    ClassRpgState
    Runtime state for class passives and active skill flags.
    ClassRpgState.HitStreak
     
    ClassRpgState.RageState
     
    ClassSelectionPage
    Class selection UI page for TalaniaClassRPG.
    ClassSelectionPage.ClassEventData
     
    ClassService
    Assigns classes to players and keeps profile state in sync.
    ClassType
    Canonical class definitions based on .docx design docs.
    CombatXpService
    Awards class XP for combat interactions.
    LeadStormEffect
    Repeating AoE damage around the caster.
    MovementFreezeEffect
    Fully freezes movement for a short duration.
    MovementModifierEffect
    Temporary movement speed modifier for a player entity.
    PassiveSkill
    Definition for a passive skill.
    PoisonEffect
    Simple poison damage-over-time effect.
    PullEffect
    Pulls nearby entities toward a center point for a short duration.
    RadianceEffect
    Paladin Radiance healing zone with enemy slow.
    RainOfVengeanceEffect
    Delayed rain-of-arrows strike with slow.
    SkillSlot
    Active skill slots mapped to action keys.
    TalaniaClassRpgPlugin
    Class RPG module plugin.
    TimedFlightEffect
    Temporarily grants flight using TimedFlightUtil.
    TimedInvulnerabilityEffect
    Temporarily makes an entity invulnerable by toggling the effect controller.
    TimedStatModifierEffect
    Temporary stat modifiers applied for a fixed duration.
